titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on 1,8 Dichloroanthraquinone and 1,8 Diaminonapthalene.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E856)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/7/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on: (1) 1,8 dichloroanthraquinone; and (2) 1,8 diaminonapthalene.
